channel.title: How do i change the starter outfit?
channel.description:
Please help :S I need to know where to find the starter outfit is so i could change it Any help please?? :)
Regards <I K O I>

item.title: How do i change the starter outfit?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.source: How do i change the starter outfit?

item.title: How do i change the starter outfit?
item.dc:creator: @sickpk sickpk
item.description:
@sickpk wrote:

[quote=“Pwnage Sh0w, post:5, topic:232617”]Here is how you do it…

Go to Player.java / Player.java is the Notepad named Player

Then…

Hold down Control or the key Ctrl, and hit F and type Unique

It should look something like this

  // Giving the player an unique look
        playerEquipment[playerHat]=12358;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=15714;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=15348;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=7462;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=15352;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Change all those numbers to the items you want. Those numbers are the Item ID’s for the item. Hope this helps :D[/quote]
Thanks for that it even helped me lol, rep+

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the starter outfit?

item.title: How do i change the starter outfit?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

Here is how you do it…

Go to Player.java / Player.java is the Notepad named Player

Then…

Hold down Control or the key Ctrl, and hit F and type Unique

It should look something like this

  // Giving the player an unique look
        playerEquipment[playerHat]=12358;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=15714;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=15348;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=7462;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=15352;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Change all those numbers to the items you want. Those numbers are the Item ID’s for the item. Hope this helps

Read full topic

TOMSCAPE BETA:

theres a easier way just search “starter” then at the bottom you will see codes and amounts just chnage them to what you want or if you want to change what you wear when you log on player.java and search giving the player and it will come up with codes just chnage the, to what you want if you need any more help with anything feel free to pm me

NOt starter… The starting outfit.
Starter outfit would be in Player.java
